{"id":597201632,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1638688254,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/597201632/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Two Sum IV - Input is a BST","memory":"39.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int inorder(TreeNode *root, int &k, set<int> &s) {\n        if (!root)\n            return -1;\n        if (inorder(root->left, k, s) == 0)\n            return 0;\n        //cout << k << \" \" << root->val << endl;\n        if (s.find(k - root->val) != s.end())\n            return 0;\n        \n        s.insert(root->val);\n        return inorder(root->right, k, s);\n     }\n    bool findTarget(TreeNode* root, int k) {\n        set<int> s;\n        if (inorder(root, k, s) == 0)\n            return true;\n        return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"two-sum-iv-input-is-a-bst","has_notes":false}
